item.title: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk might be ‘best friends,’ and now Amazon reportedly plans to buy ads on X
item.description: Amazon chairman Jeff Bezos has bolstered its advertising on X, a year after the platform saw an exodus.

item.title: Delta is teaming up with Airbus on a flight technique based on migrating geese to improve fuel efficiency and reduce emissions

item.title: Can you get bird flu from eating eggs? What you need to know about staying safe
item.description: Being mindful of where your food comes from and how it’s prepared will go a long way toward keeping you, your loved ones, and your community safe.

item.title: Multiple deaths reported after fiery plane crash near Philadelphia mall
item.description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro said the state would marshall its resources in responding to the horrific explosion.

item.title: Amazon is jumping on the DeepSeek wave to boast about its AI game. But the real test will be its upcoming earnings
